sentences.en: A low - growing , weedy grass ( Paspalum distichum ) with spikelets arranged in two rows along the rachis.
sentences.cn: 两耳草一种小穗沿叶轴排成两行的低矮蔓生草 ( 两耳草雀稗属 )

sentences.en: Any of several weedy plants of the genera Mercurialis or Acalypha.
sentences.cn: 山''.'靛'.''任一种山''.'靛'. ''属或大戟科的草本植物.

sentences.en: Below the bridge we could just discern a narrow, weedy ditch.
sentences.cn: 我们仅能依稀辨出桥下一条杂草丛生的窄沟。

sentences.en: He doesn't mention the weedy garden.
sentences.cn: 却不提花园里长满了杂草.

sentences.en: His dramatic acting style and weedy humor delighted the audience.
sentences.cn: 观众对他戏剧性的表演形式和诙谐幽默感很欣赏.

sentences.en: Lacking shears, I tried to pull the longest , growing lank and weedy now, with my hands.
sentences.cn: 坟墓四周已经杂草丛生, 又高又细.因为没带剪刀, 所我只好用手拔掉杂草.

sentences.en: The car was parked in the small weedy lot next to the hotel.
sentences.cn: 轿车停在紧挨旅馆的一小块草地上。

sentences.en: We pulled into the weedy parking lot.
sentences.cn: 我们开进了杂草丛生的停车场。

sentences.en: Weedy morning - glory vines overran the rainforest canopy.
sentences.cn: 蔓生的牵牛花藤越过了雨林的天蓬,疯长开去.

words.tran_cn: 瘦弱的；似杂草的；尽是杂草的

trans.tran_cn: <非正，贬> 瘦弱的，性格软弱的，杂草丛生的
